title: Umpire Naseem Sheikh dies while supervising a game
text:
Local umpire Naseem Sheikh suffered a heart attack while supervising a cricket match at the TMC Ground Karachi on Monday, which cost his life.

The official was rushed to a hospital, but he lost the battle of his life before reaching there.

“He fell down while supervising the match. He was rushed in an ambulance to a nearby hospital but died on the way,” a match organizer said.

Sheikh, a resident of Liaquatabad, had been suffering from heart disease and had earlier gone through an angiography.
